Trac vs Redmine

Perhaps it's a good idea to take a look at redmine!

You can find it here:<a href="http://www.redmine.org">www.redmine.org</a>.

It's a trac replacement build on RoR with a load of good plugins for supporting an Agile development process (like resourceplanning, graphing and codereview)
